author: Mary Berry
method: Whisk the cream in a bowl until soft peaks form when the whisk is removed.  Stir in the yoghurt, lemon zest and juice, sugar and milk. Whisk until well combined. Pour into a 1.5 litre/2½ pint shallow plastic container, cover with a lid and freeze for at least six hours, preferably overnight, until firm. Remove the ice cream from the freezer, cut into chunks and blend in a processor until smooth and creamy.  Return to the plastic container, cover with the lid and return to the freezer until required.
ingredients: 300ml/½ pint double cream,  300ml/½ pint full-fat natural yoghurt,  2 lemons, finely grated zest and juice,  350g/12oz caster sugar,  300ml/½ pint milk
